EmailTemplate.name: RE: enVision/MBO onboarding - Marshall Gunsel (1341328644.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: enVision/MBO onboarding - Marshall Gunsel (1341328644.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Thanks Nicolette. Im looking forward to working with all of you and continuing my work with Marshall. Have a lovely holiday,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2012 11:15 AM To: Mark Spoor; Marshall Gunsel; Nancy Weingarten; Cheryl Schaar Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: enVision/MBO onboarding - Marshall Gunsel Hi Mark, I just wanted to let you know that my colleague Sara Conde actually spoke with Marshall last week while I was out of the office on vacation so she is helping him get set up, so he does not need to speak with me J. I have copied Sara on this email and you can forward her any information regarding getting Marshall set up. Thank you and have a great day!Nicolette From: Mark Spoor [mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com] <mailto:[mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com]> Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2012 10:48 AM To: Marshall Gunsel; Nancy Weingarten; Cheryl Schaar Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: enVision/MBO onboarding - Marshall Gunsel Marshall - Since you are now going through MBO you wont need a contract from us. We will send MBO a SOW today with rate, start date, duration, etc., and they will set you up in their system. Once the background check is clear we will give you the green light to resign. You must have a phone conversation with our REP, Nicolette Taylor, from MBO before they will set you up. I will send an introduction to both of you suggesting you arrange a time to talk ASAP. Thanks, MARK Mark Spoor Vice President Talentp. (303) 376-6276 c. (303) 669-9107 1512 Larimer, Suite 710 Denver, Colorado 80202 www.envision-bc.com <http://www.envision-bc.com/>mspoor@envision-bc.com <mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com> The best way to stay in touch with Mark is to link with him on LinkedIn. http://www.linkedin.com/in/mspoor <http://www.linkedin.com/in/mspoor> From: Marshall Gunsel [mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com] <mailto:[mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com]> Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2012 7:24 AM To: Nancy Weingarten; Cheryl Schaar Cc: Mark Spoor Subject: Re: onboarding with enVision Business Consulting (per Nancy Weingarten) The delay may have an impact on my starting date as I am waiting for the contract before submitting my resignation to AT&T. Thanks, Marshall From: Nancy Weingarten <nweingarten@envision-bc.com <mailto:nweingarten@envision-bc.com>> To: Marshall Gunsel <gunnerg3@yahoo.com <mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com>>; Cheryl Schaar <cschaar@envision-bc.com <mailto:cschaar@envision-bc.com>> Cc: Mark Spoor <mspoor@envision-bc.com <mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com>> Sent: Monday, July 2, 2012 6:51 PM Subject: Re: onboarding with enVision Business Consulting (per Nancy Weingarten) Apologies for the delay, Marshall. Cheryl is off on Mondays & I forgot to tell you that this morning. You should hear back from her first thing tomorrow. Just remember she's Mountain Standard Time. We'll definitely be back on track tomorrow. Thanks,Nancy
Nancy WeingartenVice President, Northeast Region c. (404) 664-5652o. (201) 702-1826f. (201) 702-1840 nweingarten@envision-bc.com <mailto:nweingarten@envision-bc.com>www.envision-bc.com <http://www.envision-bc.com/>
From: Marshall Gunsel <gunnerg3@yahoo.com <mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com>> Reply-To: Marshall Gunsel <gunnerg3@yahoo.com <mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com>> Date: Monday, July 2, 2012 6:48 PM To: Cheryl Schaar <cschaar@envision-bc.com <mailto:cschaar@envision-bc.com>> Cc: NANCY WEINGARTEN <nweingarten@envision-bc.com <mailto:nweingarten@envision-bc.com>>, Mark Spoor <mspoor@envision-bc.com <mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com>> Subject: Re: onboarding with enVision Business Consulting (per Nancy Weingarten) Hi everyone-- I still do not see a contract. Also, I wanted to advise you that I will going through MBO partners as a W-2 once I have a contract. Please advise when that should happen. Regards, Marshall Gunsel From: Cheryl Schaar <cschaar@envision-bc.com <mailto:cschaar@envision-bc.com>> To: "gunnerg3@yahoo.com <mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com>" <gunnerg3@yahoo.com <mailto:gunnerg3@yahoo.com>> Cc: Cheryl Schaar <cschaar@envision-bc.com <mailto:cschaar@envision-bc.com>> Sent: Friday, June 29, 2012 8:02 PM Subject: onboarding with enVision Business Consulting (per Nancy Weingarten) Welcome Aboard! Attached please find forms that I will need completed and returned to me as soon as possible, especially the Fair Credit Reporting and Motor (& no we do not check your credit  it is a standard form for our background check). There will be additional forms, but this will help me get you started. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask. Cheryl
Cheryl Schaar Office Manager p. (303) 376-6253c. (956) 453-9669efax. (303) 376-6246 cschaar@envision-bc.com <mailto:cschaar@envision-bc.com> 1512 Larimer Street, Suite 710 Denver, Colorado 80202 www.envision-bc.com <http://www.envision-bc.com/> </h
